definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: as adverb. accus. 1Ki 21:27 :[[וַיְהַלֵח אַֽט]] and he (Ahab) went about softly (sc. in penitence);

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with [[לְ]] of norm or state (as in [[לָבֶטַח]], v. [[לְ]]) 2Sa 18:5 [[לְאַט־לִי לַנַּעַר]] (deal) gently for me with the young man, Is 8:6 the waters of Shiloah [[הַהׂלְכִים לְאַָט]] that go gently; with pretonic qameṣ Job 15:11 :[[דָּבָר לָאַט עִמָּֽח]] a word (spoken) gently with thee; with sf. Ge 33:14 and I [[אֶתְנַהֲלָה לְאִטִּי]] will lead on gently (lit. according to my gentleness).
